mapper.sql: PKID, CTM_CODE, AGENT_CODE, CASE_CODE, REQUIRE_PROCESSOR_ID, IS_RESPONSED,RES_DATE, AGENT_NAME,DISPATCH_TIME,IMPORT_TIME, GRP_CODE, GRP_NAME, AGENT_USERNAME, AR_CODE, AR_NAME, AGENT_PHONE,TARGET_CODE, QJDS_NAME,QYJL_NAME,QYZJ_NAME,SWZ_CODE,SWZ_NAME,WZ_CODE,WZ_NAME,BA_CODE,BA_NAME, refer_consultant_id,refer_consultant_realname
mapper.insert: insert into sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO (PKID, CTM_CODE, AGENT_CODE, CASE_CODE, REQUIRE_PROCESSOR_ID, IS_RESPONSED,RES_DATE, AGENT_NAME,DISPATCH_TIME, AGENT_USERNAME, AR_CODE, AR_NAME, AGENT_PHONE ,CREATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME,CREATE_BY,UPDATE_BY ) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ctmCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requireProcessorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isResponsed,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{resDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dispatchTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{agentUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},GETDATE(),GETDATE(),@{SESSION_USER_ID},@{SESSION_USER_ID})

PKID,

GETDATE(),GETDATE(),@{SESSION_USER_ID},@{SESSION_USER_ID},
mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO set CTM_CODE = #{ctmCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_CODE = #{agentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUIRE_PROCESSOR_ID = #{requireProcessorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_RESPONSED = #{isResponsed,jdbcType=CHAR}, RES_DATE = #{resDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DISPATCH_TIME = #{dispatchTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AGENT_NAME = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_USERNAME = #{agentUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMPORT_TIME = #{importTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GRP_CODE = #{grpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRP_NAME = #{grpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AR_CODE = #{arCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AR_NAME = #{arName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TARGET_CODE = #{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refer_consultant_id = #{referConsultantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refer_consultant_realname = #{referConsultantRealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_PHONE = #{agentPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1 ID FROM sctrans.SYS_ORG WHERE ORG_CODE = #{yuTeamCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select COUNT(CASE_CODE) from sctrans.T_TO_CASE where LEADING_PROCESS_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY LEADING_PROCESS_ID

select COUNT(A.CASE_CODE) from sctrans.T_TO_CASE A, sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO B where A.LEADING_PROCESS_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE and datediff(month,B.RES_DATE,getdate())=0 GROUP BY A.LEADING_PROCESS_ID
select COUNT(CASE_CODE) from sctrans.T_TO_CASE where LEADING_PROCESS_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STATUS in('30001003','30001002')
select CASE_CODE from sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO where CTM_CODE=#{ctmCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(1) from sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO where CTM_CODE=#{ctmCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
